A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
This movie is going to cut the Star Wars community down the middle. I am so utterly disappointed. I haven't really done a lot of reviews\, if ever\, on here\, but I want to send a message to Disney and Rian Johnson. You screwed up. Big. For the first time since 1977 I don't care what happens next in the Star Wars universe. I have no more questions. What you answered didn't satisfy me and the decisions made are baffling.

I would give this a one star rating\, but there were SOME redeeming moments and it was well shot\, just horrible... HORRIBLE writing. 

I come into a movie like this with two sets of eyes. One as a fan and one as someone who loves movies. It failed me in both ways.
